reuters.title: UNIVERSITY PATENTS INC <UPT> 2ND QTR JAN 31 NET
reuters.body: Oper shr 24 cts vs 19 cts Oper net 1,096,332 vs 794,711 Revs 803,085 vs 442,420 Six mths Oper shr 53 cts vs 43 cts Oper net 2,375,844 vs 1,741,437 Revs 1,471,257 vs 768,683 NOTE: Prior year excludes income from discontinued operations of 19 cts per share in the quarter and 17 cts per share in the year. Reuter 
